content: this beautiful fresh start dishcloth is quick to work up and has a fantastic texture it is available in three different sizes this pattern is one of the january contributions to the 2026 dishcloth cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 44-177 yds of category 4 medium weight cotton yarn i used paintbox yarns cotton aran yarn in the 641 royal blue colorway * size h 5mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
